blogPost.excerpt: AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository, that caters to the needs to store and share your Awards & Achievements.
blogPost.body: AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository, that caters to the needs to store and share your Awards & Achievements.
blogPost.title: AwardsAdda -  AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository
blogPost.author: Andra Aru

localize.description: AwardsAdda是一个集中式的奖项库，它满足了存储和分享你的奖项和成就的需求。
AwardsAdda是一個集中式的獎項庫，它滿足了存儲和分享你的獎項和成就的需求。

previous.excerpt: Grow your audience on Social Media by delivering rich, high-quality content. Consistently, on schedule, at scale.
previous.title: FeedHive - A tool for Content Creators

localize.description: 通过提供丰富、高质量的内容来增加您在社交媒体上的受众。始终如一、按计划、大规模地提供内容。
通過提供豐富、高質量的內容來增加您在社交媒體上的受衆。始終如一、按計劃、大規模地提供內容。

next.excerpt: This is a collection of multiplayer speed-typing games to kill boredom in Slack workspaces and Discord servers.
next.title: Fastest Fingers for Slack and Discord - Multiplayer speed typing games for Slack and Discord

localize.description: 这是一个多人速打游戏的集合，可以在Slack工作空间和Discord服务器上打发无聊的时间。
這是一個多人速打遊戲的集合，可以在Slack工作空間和Discord服務器上打發無聊的時間。
